alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 10:24PM MDT until May 14 at 8:34AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Moderate Flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 8.2 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.3 feet on 07/26/1950. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1030 AM MDT.
